resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
Espresso with added hot water (100–150 ml). Often served in a cappuccino cup.
A tall, mild "milk coffee". Espresso with steamed milk and a little milk foam.
Espresso with steamed milk and thick milk foam, often dusted with cocoa.
Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk; sweet and creamy.
